job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtIts fun to work in a company where people truly BELIEVE in what theyre doing ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtWere committed to bringing passion and customer focus to the businessltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtMachine Learning EngineerltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtltemgtIn the time it takes you to read this job description roughly 1380 emergencies will be handled by RapidSOSltbrgtltbrgtltemgtltstronggtRapidSOS is hiring Join an advanced emergency technology startup in transforming emergency response for hundreds of millions of people globallyltbrgtltbrgtIn partnership with public safety RapidSOS has created the worlds first emergency response data platform that securely links lifesaving data from 350M connected devices directly to 911 and first responders in an emergency Through the platform were providing intelligent data that supports over 4800 Emergency Communications Centers protecting 90 of people in the US across 150 million emergencies annuallyltbrgtltbrgtPartnering with innovative companies recognized as RapidSOS Ready were striving to reach everyone Together were empowering a faster and smarter response by sending first responders critical data like your exact location realtime health information and crash data Were united in our commitment to a safer stronger future where technology and people work seamlessly together to save livesltbrgtltbrgtRapidSOS is backed by top venture capital firms and the former Csuite of Apple ATampampT Verizon Vodafone Virgin Group Lucent Raytheon the FCC Harvard Data Initiative and MITltbrgtltbrgtVideo ltugtRapidSOS 3Min Summary VideoltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtltugtRapidSOS In The Last 18 Monthsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt Launched in multiple countries internationally ltligtltligt Doubled team size ltligtltligt Grew revenue 10x ltligtltligt Raised 100M ltligtltligt Managed 200M emergencies on average 400Kday ltligtltligt Helped save thousands of lives ltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtWhat This Role Is AboutltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtAt RapidSOS we rely on insightful data to power our systems and solutions We are looking for a motivated Machine Learning Engineer to join our team who will identify ways to make the Data Science organization more effective at ensuring data availability quality and consistency You will work collaboratively with other data scientists product managers and our engineering teams to build a platform that provides lifesaving data to dispatchers currently covering over 92 of the US populationltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtWhat Youll Doltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt Manage processing of data ingestion and pipelining ensure all critical data sources are being ingested into the data warehouse ltligtltligt Research publicly available sources and public APIs to incorporate and enrich the data that we use in our intelligent data platform ltligtltligt Automate and productize analytical processes and data pipelines ltligtltligt Implement data models to support the backend of our products ltligtltligt Collaborate with the data science team machine learning engineers and product stakeholders to ensure the endtoend success of RapidSOS solutions ltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtWhat Were Looking For In Our Ideal Candidateltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt 3 years of experience in data engineering ltligtltligt BS or higher in Computer Science or similarly quantitativetechnical field or equivalent experience ltligtltligt Experience with any of the following technologies Hadoop Spark ElasticSearch relational SQL and NoSQL databases ltligtltligt Experience working with big data sets and the AWS ecosystem ltligtltligt Experience with objectorientedobject function scripting languages Python Java C Scala etc ltligtltligt Experience with data pipeline and workflow management tools Azkaban Luigi Airflow etc ltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtWhat We Offerltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt The chance to work with a passionate team on solving one of the largest challenges globally ltligtltligt Competitive salary and benefits and equity participation ltligtltligt A dynamic flexible and fun startup work environment with a highly talented team ltbrgtltligtltulgtIf youre curious to learn more about RapidSOS you can check out our ltugtfull press listltugt ltbrgtltbrgtIf you like wild growth and working with happy enthusiastic overachievers youll enjoy your career with us
